alert.note: Alert for Henry; Jefferson; Keokuk; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Henry, southeastern Keokuk, southwestern Washington and northern Jefferson Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1214 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Richland, or 9 miles north of Fairfield, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pleasant Plain around 1230 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Brighton and Coppock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
